root.name: Lots of Guns
root.description: OverviewLots of Guns is a shooter/platformer developed and published by Stegersaurus for the Xbox Live Indie Games platform. Lots of Guns was released on January 5th, 2012 for the price of 80 Microsoft Points (or $1).GameplayThe object in Lots of Guns is to try and get as high up the platforms as possible while avoiding and shooting the enemies along the way.
